property.value: E: Change the zone of this attack to high. E Lose 2 vitality: The next attack you attempt to play gains Desperation:0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 1 vitality: If this attack is not blocked, your next attack gets +2 damage and -2 to its Desperation rating (minimum 0). E Lose 2 vitality: If this attack is blocked, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an attack card. Add the discarded attack to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After this card is committed due to your opponent's effect, they destroy 1 of their foundations. Playable while committed. E Lose 2 vitality: If your attack is blocked, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you discard this card due to your opponent's effect, destroy 1 of their foundations. Desperation E Lose 1 vitality: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: If you have lost vitality this turn, your opponent's next check to play a card gets -1. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 damage. E Flip: This attack gets -2 damage. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, lose 2 vitality: Draw 1 card. E Flip: Your Desperation or Fury attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready, your Desperation attacks get +1 damage. While this card is committed, your opponent's attacks get -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 1 vitality: This attack gets -1 speed. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: If your attack is blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality. Your opponent may destroy 1 foundation to cancel this effect. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals its printed Desperation rating. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If the top card of your discard pile has Desperation or Fury, add it to your hand. Scorpion E Discard 1 momentum: Gain 2 vitality. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your Stun attack gets +2 damage. If it is blocked, your opponent discards 1 card. E [Your attack] Flip 1 foundation: Seal 1 of your opponent's assets or foundations and commit it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block an attack with this card, that attack deals no damage. E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Seal up to 3 of your opponent's foundations. This attack gets +1 to its Stun rating.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed for each of your opponent's sealed foundations. E: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's committed foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, seal your opponent's character and commit it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 face down foundation: Add all copies of 'Ice Klone' from your card pool to your momentum. E Discard 1 momentum: Seal 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this card, seal 1 of your opponent's foundations and commit it. E: If this attack is blocked, seal 1 of your opponent's foundations and commit it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total printed Stun rating on all cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After a Stun attack deals damage, both players discard 1 card. Sub Zero R Destroy: After 1 of your foundations is flipped, unflip 2 foundations.

card.name: Destruction of the Cyber Lin Kuei

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 face down foundation: This attack gets -2 speed and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your Stun attack gets +1 damage. E Seal this foundation: Your opponent seals 1 of their ready face up foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After an attack is not blocked, add 1 of your face down foundations to your hand. E Discard 1 momentum: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Once per turn]: Commit 1 sealed foundation in your opponent's staging area. E Commit 1 foundation: Your Stun attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Both players can only play 1 more enhance this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 face down foundation: After you play a Stun ability, both players lose 1 vitality. E Commit: Your attack gets + 2 damage. If your opponent has no ready foundations, this attack gets an additional +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R[Card Pool]: After you block with this card, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, seal your character: Add 1 foundation from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Before the Damage Step, if this attack has 3 or more keywords, reduce its damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: You may play 1 Combo ability that you have already played this Enhance Step. E[Once per turn]: Add 1 card from your discard pile to the top of your deck. E Discard the top card of your deck: Your attack gains all Combo abilities printed on the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Add 1 card from your discard pile to the top of your deck. This attack gets +3 speed or +3 damage. Deadlock Combo E: This attack gains Stun:2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it or add it to your card pool face up in any order. Combo E: Your Combo attacks get +1 speed, +1 damage and Stun:1 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +2 damage and Stun:2. Deadlock Combo E: This attack gets +1 speed for each of your opponent's committed foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +4 damage. Combo E: Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card. Deadlock Combo E: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: You may play 1 Deadlock ability this Enhance Step, even if your opponent is not at Deadlock. Only playable if you have played a Combo ability this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gains Stun:1. E Flip: Your Combo attack gains Stun:1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card was a Combo attack. this attack gets +3 or -3 speed. Add the discarded card to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After your opponent plays an ability on an action card, they discard 1 card. R Flip: After you discard any number of cards due to your opponent's effect, draw 1 card. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Deadlock E: If the printed damage of your attack is greater than your opponent's current vitality, you win the game. Only playable if there is a terrain card in either player's staging area. F: Remove 1 asset card from either player's staging area. If your opponent is at Deadlock, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If your attack's damage is 5 or greater, draw 1 card and your opponent discards the top 5 cards of their deck. E Remove: If your attack's damage is 10 or greater, draw 2 cards and your opponent discards to top 10 cards of their deck. E Remove: If your attack's damage is 15 or greater, draw 3 cards and your opponent discards the top 15 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Attacks get -1 speed and -1 damage. R Add 1 of your foundations to your card pool: After an action card is played, your opponent adds the top card of their deck to their card pool. Copies of that action card cannot be played for the rest of this turn. Playable by either player.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Once per turn] Discard 1 card: Draw 1 card. R Discard 1 momentum: After an attack is played, it loses all of its printed keywords and gains Throw. Playable by either player.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready, attacks lose Safe and cannot gain keywords or have their keyword ratings increased. E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage. You may add 1 copy of 'Stage Kill' from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose 3 vitality: After a card is played, copies of that card cannot be played for the rest of this turn. Playable by either player. Evil E[Once per turn]: Gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: The damage of this attack cannot be reduced by your opponent's effects. R: After you play this attack, if your opponent is at 3 or less vitality, this attack is unblockable and gains Flash.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack cannot deal damage and your opponent cannot play abilities during this attack. After this attack resolves, you may add it to your momentum. R: After you play this card, name a card. Remove all copies of the named card from your opponent's discard pile. Deadlock Combo E: If your opponent is at Desperation, you win the game. This ability cannot be canceled.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Your abilities cannot be canceled by card effects. R Lose 2 vitality: After your opponent plays an ability that draws any number of cards, destroy 1 of their foundations or commit their character. E Lose 2 vitality: Your attack gets +2 speed. If you are at Desperation, draw 2 cards and discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy 1 foundation: You are considered to be at Desperation for the rest of this Combat Phase. E: If your opponent does not attempt to block your attack, your next attack this turn gets Multiple: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R[Twice per turn]: After you play a Combo ability, your opponent adds the top card of their deck to their card pool face down. E Commit: Discard the top X cards of your deck and add 1 Combo attack discarded this way to your hand. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Twice per turn] Remove 1 character card from your discard pile: For the rest of this Enhance Step, your starting character gains all enhance abilities printed on the removed card. R [Once per Enhance Step]: After your opponent plays an enhance ability, this attack gets +1 or -1 damage.
